H0.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Noah's Ark. Exodus

H1.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Noah's Ark. Leviticus

H2.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Noah's Ark. Numbers

H3.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Noah's Ark. Génesis

A4.text: The Book of Genesis (from Greek Γένεσις, Génesis; Biblical Hebrew: בְּרֵאשִׁית‎, romanized: Bərēʾšīṯ, lit. 'In [the] beginning'; Latin: Liber Genesis) is the first book of the Hebrew Bible and the Christian Old Testament.
